text: The Princeton Field Guide to Dinosaurs is a book on dinosaurs written by the paleontologist and artist Gregory S. Paul. It was published by Princeton University Press in 2010. It has also been printed in a British edition titled Dinosaurs: A Field Guide, published by A & C Black. The Princeton Field Guide to Dinosaurs covers the dinosaurs' biology, their extinction, and different genera and species, illustrated with sketches and skeletal drawings. A second edition was published in October 2016. ==References== ==External links== *, , , PDF previews of the book. title: The Princeton Field Guide to Dinosaurs
